text:
Urbana, Illinois
July 31, 1953
Mr. Hugh S. MastÂ©re
Director, Education Division
W, K. Kellogg Foundation
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Mr. Masterss
While I have been giving all my
correspondence on behalf of N.A.E.B to Bob
YanDuyn, I know he is departing for Europe
today. So, I am dropping you this note
Just to be sure that Kellogg receives from
the University of Illinois Business Office
the financial report covering the fiscal
year closing June 30, 195?.
Sincerely,
Frank 2. Sehooley
Treasurer
FES/bo
cos Harry J. Skorni
